sense.gloss: fundoshi, loincloth, traditional Japanese men's undergarment made from a length of cotton
either side of a rikishi's mawashi
(wearing) a loincloth alone, nothing but a loincloth
x: ふんどし一丁・ふんどしいっちょう

sense.gloss: coming of age ceremony where boys get a new loincloth and girls a new underskirt

k_ele.e: 人のふんどしで相撲を取る
ひとのふんどしで相撲を取る

r_ele.r: ひとのふんどしですもうをとる

sense.gloss: to profit at someone else's expense, to rob Peter to pay Paul, to take risks with other people's money
x: 他人のふんどしで相撲を取る・たにんのふんどしですもうをとる

k_ele.e: 他人のふんどしで相撲を取る
他人の褌で相撲を取る

r_ele.r: たにんのふんどしですもうをとる

sense.gloss: to profit at someone else's expense, to rob Peter to pay Paul, to take risks with other people's money
x: 人のふんどしで相撲を取る・ひとのふんどしですもうをとる

sense.gloss: (wearing) a loincloth alone, nothing but a loincloth

k_ele.e: ふんどしを締めてかかる

r_ele.r: ふんどしをしめてかかる

sense.gloss: to roll up one's sleeves and get to work, to buckle down
